Articles.Content:
Please. THis isn't a demand of course, it's a request. In my opinion, the name for KSP 1.0 should just be "Kerbal Space Program" Maybe with gold lettering.

Point is, the thing being released for 1.0 is not an update to a beta. It's releasing THE game. Adding something to it just wouldn't be right.

I know people will yell at me for making this an issue, but for some reason this matters.

Hmm... I somehow doubt that it will actually be titled "Beyond Beta." Over the last few releases, they seem to be adopting a name for that particular release, but it ends up having no outward display in the product itself. More of a nick name for all the associated articles and dev notes about the upcoming release.

I would suspect that it'll continue to carry it's current title of "Kerbal Space Program" just like it has.

Just my thoughts.

Cheers,

~Claw

I can't see how it's ready for 1.0

Beta is the time where you test all the features... you don't finally get all the features you want ready and magically the beta is over without them being tested.
1.0 is not going to be called by a beta-derived name, folks. Let's move along, please.
